shortdesc.ph: Obtain the actual absolute path of the Asset through the relative path of the Asset.

p.codeblock: virtual int getCapability(const char* deviceIdUTF8, const uint32_t deviceCapabilityNumber, VideoFormat& capability) = 0;
public abstract int GetCapability(string deviceIdUTF8, uint deviceCapabilityNumber, out VideoFormat capability);
Future<VideoFormat> getCapability( {required String deviceIdUTF8, required int deviceCapabilityNumber});

plentry.pd: The flutter -> assets field configured in the pubspec.yaml file.

section.title: Returns
section.p: The actual path of the Asset.
